discussion.p: The *[ui:Type]* property defines the data type of the stored value for a control. Common data types include:

item.name: Character
item.description: Stored value is a string of characters.

item.name: Date
item.description: Stored value is a date. E.g. *[xb: 1907/17/06]*

item.name: Time
item.description: Stored value is a date-time object. E.g. *[xb:2017/05/28 11:58 AM]*

item.name: Short-time
item.description: Stored value is time. E.g. *[xb:6:30 PM]*

item.name: Logical
item.description: Stored value is a boolean that can have one of two states: true or false.

item.name: Guid
item.description: Stored value is a GUID (short for "Globally Unique Identifier".)
